body_html: any news on this issue? Or did anyone find a way to circumvent this issue by transforming the tensor before applying group norm? I tried tf.map_fn(tensor, lambda x: group_norm(x, ...)) but without success.
body_text: any news on this issue? Or did anyone find a way to circumvent this issue by transforming the tensor before applying group norm? I tried tf.map_fn(tensor, lambda x: group_norm(x, ...)) but without success.
body: any news on this issue? Or did anyone find a way to circumvent this issue by transforming the tensor before applying group norm? I tried `tf.map_fn(tensor, lambda x: group_norm(x, ...))` but without success.
